main.biography.title: Biography
main.biography.text:
I'm a passionate and highly motivated software developer dedicated to creating innovative and functional technological solutions ðŸ˜Ž. Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, I bring a unique combination of technical skills and practical experience. My journey includes internships at leading technology companies, where I've developed expertise in technologies like Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Git, Flutter, and much more.

With a solid academic background and a passion for learning, I've been involved in diverse projects, from creating innovative applications to developing interactive websites. I have a proven track record in team collaboration, problem-solving, and interpersonal skills, making me a valuable member for any development team.

My approach is customer-centered and quality-focused, always seeking to overcome technical challenges and create exceptional user experiences. I'm excited to continue my journey as a software developer, contributing to innovative projects and being part of dynamic teams that share my passion for technology.

I'm a dreamer, brave and determined person wanting to get a challenging job and opportunity to change people's life and work.
